name: One Last Journey
description:
One Last Journey is a 2.5D adventure puzzle game. Listen to a mother’s bedtime story about an immortal who want to reunite with his deceased lover.

Play as a Cain, someone who has lived for a looooooong time. Help him meet the Witch of Space and Time who can grant his wish. 

Tackle every obstacle and solve every puzzle by using the monsters that devour you. But watch out, if the monster successfully digest you, you’ll lost your immortality.  

Features

Enjoy Cain’s odyssey in a form of bed time story that you can listen while venturing the wailing woods, a forest full of monsters!

Woods full of monsters with unique skills ready for you to explore  if you let them devour you

Multiple of puzzles and obstacles awaits you in the wailing woods to solve

Run from the menacing boss, Beat them with the trap or anything that you found. Watch out, they are too strong! You can’t control ‘em!

Listen to the soothing background music and ambience that accompany your odyssey,

Watch the trailer here

One Last Journey adapted from MantraWita’s original music video, Sihir Rindu
